typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		GroupId as string,
		ClientId as string,
		POSCode as string,
		PropertyCode as integer,
		RegionCode as integer,
		BrandCode as integer,
		CountryCode as integer,
		BillOrder as string,
		BillNo as string,
		BillDateTime as timestamp,
		SerialNo as integer,
		MenuItemCode as string,
		TDHCode as string,
		TDHNo as integer,
		TDHSerialNo as integer,
		IncomeHeadCode as integer,
		Quantity as decimal(38,8),
		CostCenterCode as integer,
		MenuHeadCode as integer,
		MenuGroupCode as integer,
		MenuSubGroupCode as integer,
		CourseCode as integer,
		FreeQuantity as decimal(38,8),
		Rate as decimal(38,8),
		OriginalRate as decimal(38,8),
		BackwardRate as decimal(38,8),
		Cost as decimal(38,8),
		Discount as decimal(38,8),
		DiscountType as string,
		ModifierRate as decimal(38,8),
		CalcDiscount as decimal(38,8),
		DiscountAfterPromotion as decimal(38,8),
		DiscCardCode as integer,
		DiscCardDetailsCode as integer,
		NetAmount as decimal(38,8),
		TaxOnCost as boolean,
		HappyHour as boolean,
		RateCode as integer,
		SpecialRateCode as integer,
		ItemTotalTax as decimal(38,10),
		VoidReasonCode as integer,
		VoidType as string,
		CategoryCode as string,
		PayCompliment as integer,
		ReservationNo as string,
		KioskCode as integer,
		ShiftCode as integer,
		BillVoidBy as string,
		BillVoidDate as timestamp,
		Membercode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select \'002\' GroupId,\n\'000\' ClientId,\nIsNull(T1.POSCode,\'\') as POSCode,\nIsNull(T1.PropertyCode,0) as PropertyCode,\nIsNull(T1.RegionCode,0) as RegionCode,\nIsNull(T1.BrandCode,0) as BrandCode,\nIsNull(T1.CountryCode,0) as CountryCode,\nIsNull(T1.BillOrder,\'\') as BillOrder,\nIsNull(T1.BillNo,\'\') as BillNo,\nIsNull(t2.BillDateTime,\'\') as BillDateTime,\nIsNull(T1.SerialNo,0)  as SerialNo,\nIsNull(T1.MenuItemCode,\'\') as MenuItemCode,\nIsNull(T1.TDHCode,\'\') as TDHCode,\nIsNull(T1.TDHNo,0) as TDHNo,\nIsNull(T1.TDHSerialNo,0)  as TDHSerialNo,\nIsNull(T1.IncomeHeadCode,0) as IncomeHeadCode,\nIsNull(T1.Quantity,0) as Quantity,\nIsNull(T1.CostCenterCode,0) as CostCenterCode,\nIsNull(T1.MenuHeadCode,0) as MenuHeadCode,\nIsNull(T1.MenuGroupCode,0) as MenuGroupCode,\nIsNull(T1.MenuSubGroupCode,0) as MenuSubGroupCode,\nIsNull(T1.CourseCode,0) as CourseCode,\nIsNull(T1.FreeQuantity,0) as FreeQuantity,\nIsNull(T1.Rate,0) as Rate,\nIsNull(T1.OriginalRate,0) as OriginalRate,\nIsNull(T1.BackwardRate,0) as BackwardRate,\nIsNull(T1.Cost,0) as Cost,\nIsNull(T1.Discount,0) as Discount,\nIsNull(T1.DiscountType,\'\') as DiscountType,\nIsNull(T1.ModifierRate,0) as ModifierRate,\nIsNull(T1.CalcDiscount,0) as CalcDiscount,\nIsNull(T1.DiscountAfterPromotion,0) as DiscountAfterPromotion,\nIsNull(t2.DiscountCardCode,0) as DiscCardCode, \nIsNull(t2.DiscountCardDetailsCode,0) as DiscCardDetailsCode,\nIsNull(T1.NetAmount,0) as NetAmount,\nIsNull(T1.TaxOnCost,0) as TaxOnCost,\nIsNull(T1.HappyHour,0) as HappyHour,\nIsNull(T1.RateCode,0) as RateCode,\nIsNull(T1.SpecialRateCode,0) as SpecialRateCode,\nIsNull(T1.ItemTotalTax,0) as ItemTotalTax,\nIsNull(T1.VoidReasonCode,0) as VoidReasonCode,\nIsNull(T1.VoidType,\'\') as VoidType,\nIsNull(T1.CategoryCode,\'\') as CategoryCode,\nCase When isnull(t2.PayCompliment,0) = 1 then 1 else 0 end as PayCompliment,\nisnull(t2.ReservationNo,\'\') ReservationNo,\nIsNull(T1.KioskCode,0) as KioskCode,\nIsNull(t2.BillSettledShift,0) as ShiftCode,\nisnull(t2.CreatedBy,\'\') BillVoidBy,\nisnull(t2.CreatedDate,\'\') BillVoidDate,\nIsNull(t2.Membercode,\'\') as Membercode\nfrom QFile.TblBillOrderDetail t1 with(nolock)\nleft outer join QFile.TblBillOrderHead t2 with(nolock) on T1.poscode = t2.poscode and T1.billno = t2.billno \nand Cast(T1.BillDatetime as Date) = Cast(t2.BillDateTime as Date) and T1.BillOrder = t2.BillOrder \nWhere IsNull(t2.VoidType,\'\') <> \'\'',
	format: 'query') ~> dsbillordervoiddetail
dsbillordervoiddetail alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> arbillordervoiddetail
arbillordervoiddetail sink(input(
		BillOrderVoidDetailID as integer,
		GroupId as string,
		ClientId as string,
		POSCode as string,
		PropertyCode as integer,
		RegionCode as integer,
		BrandCode as integer,
		CountryCode as integer,
		BillOrder as string,
		BillNo as string,
		BillDateTime as timestamp,
		SerialNo as integer,
		MenuItemCode as string,
		TDHCode as string,
		TDHNo as integer,
		TDHSerialNo as integer,
		IncomeHeadCode as integer,
		Quantity as decimal(38,8),
		CostCenterCode as integer,
		MenuHeadCode as integer,
		MenuGroupCode as integer,
		MenuSubGroupCode as integer,
		CourseCode as integer,
		FreeQuantity as decimal(38,8),
		Rate as decimal(38,8),
		OriginalRate as decimal(38,8),
		BackwardRate as decimal(38,8),
		Cost as decimal(38,8),
		Discount as decimal(38,8),
		DiscountType as string,
		ModifierRate as decimal(38,8),
		CalcDiscount as decimal(38,8),
		NetAmount as decimal(38,8),
		TaxOnCost as boolean,
		HappyHour as boolean,
		RateCode as integer,
		SpecialRateCode as integer,
		ItemTotalTax as decimal(38,10),
		VoidReasonCode as integer,
		VoidType as string,
		CategoryCode as string,
		PayCompliment as integer,
		ReservationNo as string,
		DiscountAfterPromotion as decimal(38,8),
		DiscCardCode as integer,
		DiscCardDetailsCode as integer,
		KioskCode as integer,
		ShiftCode as integer,
		BillVoidBy as string,
		BillVoidDate as timestamp,
		MemberCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		GroupId,
		ClientId,
		POSCode,
		PropertyCode,
		RegionCode,
		BrandCode,
		CountryCode,
		BillOrder,
		BillNo,
		BillDateTime,
		SerialNo,
		MenuItemCode,
		TDHCode,
		TDHNo,
		TDHSerialNo,
		IncomeHeadCode,
		Quantity,
		CostCenterCode,
		MenuHeadCode,
		MenuGroupCode,
		MenuSubGroupCode,
		CourseCode,
		FreeQuantity,
		Rate,
		OriginalRate,
		BackwardRate,
		Cost,
		Discount,
		DiscountType,
		ModifierRate,
		CalcDiscount,
		NetAmount,
		TaxOnCost,
		HappyHour,
		RateCode,
		SpecialRateCode,
		ItemTotalTax,
		VoidReasonCode,
		VoidType,
		CategoryCode,
		PayCompliment,
		ReservationNo,
		DiscountAfterPromotion,
		DiscCardCode,
		DiscCardDetailsCode,
		KioskCode,
		ShiftCode,
		BillVoidBy,
		BillVoidDate,
		MemberCode = Membercode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DimBillOrderVoidDetail
